channel.title: TailorMeSwiftly.com Release Notes
channel.description: Latest updates and new features for TailorMeSwiftly.com — the AI-powered resume tailoring tool.

item.title: v5.3.0 — Blog, Referrals, Accessibility & Performance
item.description:
• Blog: 6 SEO-optimized articles covering ATS strategy, resume mistakes, cover letter tips, salary negotiation, interview prep, and the hidden job market.
  • Referral Program: Share your referral link from the Account page. You both earn 5 bonus generations.
  • Accessibility: Skip-to-content links, focus-visible outlines, ARIA labels, and landmark roles across all pages.
  • Loading Skeletons: Shimmer skeleton cards on Dashboard and Results pages.
  • CSP: Content Security Policy meta tags on all pages.
  • Shared Components: Centralized header/footer via components.js.

item.title: v5.2.0 — Help Center, SEO & Polish
item.description:
• Help Center: New help.html with 17 searchable articles across 6 categories — Getting Started, Resume & Cover Letter, Career Tools, Account & Billing, Application Tracker, and Troubleshooting.
  • Forgot Password: Added a "Forgot your password?" flow to the login page with email-based reset via Supabase.
  • Password Visibility Toggle: Login and signup forms now have a show/hide password eye icon.
  • Toast Notifications: Replaced all native browser alert() popups with sleek, non-blocking toast messages.
  • Start Over Confirmation: The "Start Over" button now asks for confirmation before clearing your work.
  • Dashboard Onboarding: New users see a 3-step getting started guide on the Dashboard instead of an empty state.
  • SEO & Social Sharing: Added Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags, canonical URLs, and expanded the sitemap from 6 to 32 URLs across all pages.
  • PWA Manifest: Added manifest.json with app icons for home screen installation on mobile devices.
  • Secure Account Deletion: The delete-account flow now cancels any active Stripe subscription before removing the account.
  • Session Cleanup: Signing out now properly clears cached generation data to prevent cross-account data leaks.
  • Debug Cleanup: Removed leftover console.log statements from production code.
  • robots.txt: App pages (dashboard, history, account, results) are now blocked from search engine indexing.

item.title: v5.1.0 — Dashboard & Navigation Overhaul
item.description:
• New Dashboard: Logged-in users now land on a dedicated Dashboard with quick stats, a mini Kanban board, and one-click access to Career Command Center tools.
  • Clickable Kanban Cards: Each application card on the Dashboard links directly to its results page — no more hunting through the full tracker.
  • Streamlined Navigation: Removed the Application Tracker link from the avatar dropdown. The Dashboard now serves as the central hub.
  • Smart Redirects: Logged-in users visiting the landing page are automatically redirected to the Dashboard.
  • Tool Reorganization: Shadow Jobs, Toxic Culture Radar, and Referral Mapper moved from the global Career Command Center to the application-specific Outreach & Edge section.

item.title: v5.0.0 — Mega Expansion: 11 New AI Tools + Voice Negotiator
item.description:
• Auto-App Agent: Set your job criteria and let AI scan for matching jobs, generating tailored cover letter openers for each match.
  • Reverse Interview Generator: AI generates 5 probing questions to ask your interviewer with intel background and strategy.
  • Ghosting Predictor: AI gives a Ghosting Probability Score (0–100%) with actionable advice on whether to apply.
  • Compensation Decoder: AI calculates the true annual value of an offer with COL adjustments and equity risk warnings.
  • Skills Obsolescence Tracker: Identifies which of your skills are rising, stable, or decaying in demand.
  • Trial By Fire Tech Screen: Custom 30-minute coding challenge with built-in IDE, timer, hints, and AI code review.
  • Rejection Reverser: Turn rejections into networking opportunities with bridge-building feedback request emails.
  • Toxic Culture Radar: Scans the company for toxicity signals, layoff history, and JD red flags.
  • Thank-You Engine: Generate 3 variants of a post-interview thank-you email in seconds.
  • Voice-to-Voice Salary Negotiator: Full voice-to-voice experience with AI HR rep using your microphone.
  • Homepage Expansion: Updated toolkit grid now showcases 30+ features.

item.title: v4.0.0 — Career Toolkit Expansion
item.description:
• Brutal Roast Mode: AI delivers a brutally honest, shareable roast of your resume's weakest points.
  • Red Flag Detector: Scans your resume for cliche jargon, unexplained gaps, vague metrics, and exaggerated claims.
  • Recruiter Heatmap: Visual heatmap highlighting which phrases attract recruiter attention.
  • Burnout & Overemployment Check: Scans the JD for toxic corporate speak and generates a Flight Risk Score.
  • AI Salary Negotiator: Interactive chat simulator where you practice negotiating with a stubborn AI HR rep.
  • Prove It Metric Extractor: Finds vague bullet points and rewrites them with hard data.
  • Day in the Life Simulator: AI generates a realistic hour-by-hour day in the role.
  • Video Intro Script & Teleprompter: AI writes a 60-second video intro script with built-in webcam teleprompter.
  • Referral Network Mapper: Step-by-step referral hunting strategy with ready-to-use LinkedIn messages.
  • Shadow Job Market: Track company career pages for new openings before they hit LinkedIn.
  • Guerrilla Tactics: Aggressive strategies to bypass the ATS with email formats and ready-to-send scripts.
  • AI Insights Panel: New sidebar tab in the resume editor showing Red Flags and Burnout Check results.

item.title: v3.5.0 — Premium Tier, Mobile, Flashcards & More
item.description:
• Premium Tier: TailorMeSwiftly Premium ($9.99/mo) unlocks unlimited AI generations. Free users get 5 per month with a seamless Stripe Checkout upgrade flow.
  • Interview Flashcards: Toggle flashcard mode on the Interview Prep page — flip cards to reveal answers, swipe through on mobile, and track your progress.
  • Follow-up Reminders: Set reminder dates on any Kanban card. Overdue follow-ups surface in an amber banner at the top of your Application Tracker.
  • Mobile Responsiveness: Full responsive pass across all pages — 48px touch targets, stacked layouts on small screens, and a 320px ultra-small breakpoint.
  • Smarter Job URL Import: Paste a Greenhouse, Lever, or Workday link and the app extracts the job title, company, and description automatically via JSON-LD.
  • Edge Function Caching: Company intel lookups are now cached for 24 hours, making repeat visits instant.
  • Error Monitoring: Client-side errors are now automatically captured and logged for faster debugging.
  • RSS Feed: Subscribe to release notes via RSS at /feed.xml.

item.title: v3.4.0 — Kanban Tracker, Notes & Company Intel
item.description:
• Kanban Application Tracker: Your applications now live on a full drag-and-drop Kanban board with five columns — Tailored, Applied, Interviewing, Offer, and Rejected.
  • Click-to-Open Cards: Click any Kanban card to open a detail modal with notes, a "Go to Application" button, and Save/Cancel controls.
  • Application Notes: Add free-form notes to any application — interview dates, contact names, follow-up reminders.
  • Interview Details: Cards in the Interviewing column surface structured fields for interview date, contacts, and follow-ups.
  • Company Intel: The Introduction Email page now auto-fetches recent news and insights about your target company.
  • Light Theme Default: The app now defaults to light mode for new users.
  • UI Polish: Opaque dropdown menus, wider navigation labels, and improved auth session handling.

item.title: v3.3.0 — Past Applications & History
item.description:
• Past Applications: All your generated resumes, cover letters, interview Q&A, and outreach emails are now automatically saved to your account.
  • One-Click Restore: Instantly reload any previous application's outputs without re-generating.
  • Incremental Saves: When you generate a cover letter, interview questions, or outreach email on-demand, the save updates automatically.
  • History Navigation: Quick links to Past Applications are now available throughout the app.

item.title: v3.2.0 — Voice, Reliability & Design
item.description:
• ElevenLabs TTS: Mock interview questions are now read aloud using a premium ElevenLabs AI voice, with browser TTS as a fallback.
  • Reliable Job URL Fetching: Pasting a job listing URL now fetches through our own server, replacing old third-party proxies.
  • Resume Quick Presets: Redesigned preset buttons with color-coded accent dots.
  • Use Last Resume: Returning users can instantly load their previously uploaded resume.
  • Results Page Refresh: Updated header and background to match the main app's look and feel.
  • Improved Skill Chips: Missing skills now have higher-contrast colors in both themes.
  • Personalized Greeting: A "Hi, [Name]" greeting now appears under your avatar.

item.title: v3.1.0 — UX Polish & Improvements
item.description:
• 10 Mock Interview Questions: Increased from 8 to 10 tailored interview questions.
  • Improved Text-to-Speech: More natural voice delivery with optimized rate and pitch.
  • Dark Resume Preset: New high-contrast "Dark" theme for maximum readability.
  • Results Grid Layout: All 4 outputs now display in a single row.
  • Updated Homepage: Cleaner header design with TailorMeSwiftly.com branding above the animation.
  • Streamlined Feature Set: Focused on core strengths for a more cohesive experience.
  • Enhanced Loading Experience: Improved funny quotes display.
  • Messaging Refresh: Updated homepage copy to highlight lightning-fast results.

item.title: v3.0.0 — Major Update
item.description:
• Gaps Assistant: Renamed and refined the skill gap analysis step.
  • Mock Interview Mode: Hear questions read aloud with TTS. Practice one at a time with AI-powered feedback on recorded answers.
  • On-Demand Generation: Interview prep and email drafts generate only when you click their tab, making initial tailoring faster.
  • Application Tracker Fix: Kanban board now loads from the cloud with persistent drag-and-drop.
  • Resume Versions: All tailored resumes saved with version names. View and reload any past version.
  • Saved Jobs: Bookmark job descriptions and tailor resumes against them later.
  • Career Profile: Store a master career history in Preferences.
  • Loading Redesign: Full-screen centered loading overlay with blurred background.
  • Preferences Dropdown: Accessible from a clean dropdown on your profile avatar.
  • Generation Timeout: API calls now have timeouts with retry buttons.

item.title: v2.1.0 — Missing Skills Analysis Engine
item.description:
• Design Customization: Granularly tweak typography, accent colors, and layout spacing.
  • Target Company Preset: Extracts brand colors of your targeted company and injects them into your resume.
  • Missing Skills Extraction: Automated extraction of job requirements missing from your resume.
  • AI Co-Pilot Integration: Select missing skills you possess and our engine weaves them into your bullet points.
  • Bug Fix: Resolved the routing issue where the Application Tracker blanked out.
